title: Magnetic Hover Effect
description: A card that follows the cursor slightly, creating a magnetic effect.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses JavaScript to move the card toward the cursor on hover, creating a magnetic attraction.
html: Magnetic

title: Confetti Burst Card
description: A card that bursts confetti particles when clicked.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses JavaScript and the Canvas API to create a burst of glowing, rotating shards. The particles use colors from the site's theme, have no gravity, and leave a motion-blur trail for a futuristic feel.
html: Click for Shards!

title: Animated Gradient Border
description: A card with a border that animates with a moving gradient.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses a nested div structure. The outer div has an animated gradient background and padding. The inner div has a solid background, creating the illusion of an animated border in the padded area.
html: Animated Border

title: Typewriter Text Card
description: A card where the text appears as if being typed out.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses JavaScript to animate text as if being typed out, letter by letter.

title: Expanding Search Bar
description: A search icon that expands into a full search bar on click.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This UI component uses a small JavaScript snippet to toggle a CSS class on a container. The CSS then uses transitions to smoothly expand the width of the search bar and fade in the input field, creating a clean and space-saving search interface.

title: Gooey SVG Loader
description: A loading animation where circles merge and separate with a liquid-like effect.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This effect uses an SVG filter (`feGaussianBlur` and `feColorMatrix`) to create a 'gooey' or 'metaball' effect. The CSS animates simple circles, but the SVG filter applied to their container makes their edges blend together when they get close, creating a liquid-like appearance.

title: Futuristic Toggle Switch
description: A sleek toggle switch with a handle that rotates as it slides.
author: Jonesterw
explanation: This pure CSS component uses a hidden checkbox and the adjacent sibling combinator (+) to style a 'slider' span. When the input is checked, the slider's ::before pseudo-element (the handle) is animated using CSS transforms, creating a satisfying rotating and sliding motion, themed to fit the site.

title: Profile Tooltip Button
description: A social media icon that reveals a user profile tooltip on hover, with a 3D layered animation.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses the :hover pseudo-class on a container to reveal a hidden tooltip by changing its opacity and position. The icon itself features a 3D effect created by transforming multiple layered <span> elements on hover.
html:
User
@username
1M+ Followers
TikTok

title: Futuristic Login Form
description: A sleek login form with a gradient border and inset shadows, themed for the gallery.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses a nested structure to create a gradient border effect. The inner form has a dark background and inset shadows on the fields, while the outer container provides the animated gradient and a subtle glow on hover.
html: Login

title: Overlapping Fan Cards
description: A set of cards that overlap and fan out on hover, revealing each one in sequence.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS effect uses negative margins to stack cards. The general sibling combinator (~) is used to push subsequent cards to the side when one is hovered, creating a fanning-out motion. The progress bar animation is also triggered on hover.
html:
Explore UI
Discover a curated collection of interactive and animated user interface components.
Learn Code
Each component comes with accessible HTML, CSS, and JavaScript snippets for you to study.
Contribute
Add your own creative effects to the museum and share your work with the community.
Get Inspired
Browse through a diverse range of effects and layouts to spark your next creative project.

title: Neumorphic Expanding Card
description: A neumorphic card that expands on hover to reveal more content.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses transitions on height and transform to expand the card on hover. The styling uses inset and outset box-shadows to create a soft, 'neumorphic' plastic look, adapted to the site's dark theme.
html:
Reveal Details

Hover to expand the card and see more information. A classic example of neumorphic design.

title: Animated Glow Card
description: A card with a glowing, animated gradient border that shifts on hover.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses pseudo-elements (::before and ::after) to create a layered gradient effect. On hover, the ::before element is transformed to create a dynamic shift in the glowing border.
html:
Featured Effect

This card features an animated gradient border that shifts on hover.

CSS Only

title: Isometric Social Icons
description: A set of social media icons with a 3D isometric hover effect.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses layered <span> elements and transforms on hover to create a 3D 'isometric' lifting effect for each icon. The text label also fades in and moves into position on hover.

title: Gooey Blob Loader
description: A loading animation where three colored blobs merge and separate with a gooey effect.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses an SVG filter to create the 'gooey' or 'metaball' effect. The container is rotated while the individual dots are animated on different paths, and the filter makes them appear to merge and split like liquid.

title: Glass Aurora Card
description: A glassmorphic card with colorful background blobs that animate on hover.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS component uses a series of absolutely positioned divs with inner box-shadows. On hover, these divs transition to new positions, creating a dynamic, aurora-like background effect behind a semi-transparent content panel.
html:
Explore More

Dive into curated collections and let curiosity guide your exploration of web art.

title: Ripple & Shine Button
description: A button with a background fill, and a shine effect on hover.
author: Adapted from snippet
explanation: This pure CSS button uses pseudo-elements for its effects. The ::before element scales up to create a background fill on hover, while the ::after element, a skewed gradient, sweeps across the button to create a shine effect.

title: Instagram Profile Tooltip
description: An Instagram icon with a 3D isometric hover effect that reveals a profile tooltip.
author: vinodjangid07 (adapted)
explanation: This pure CSS component uses the :hover pseudo-class on a container to reveal a hidden tooltip. The icon itself features a 3D effect created by transforming multiple layered <span> elements on hover, themed with Instagram's brand colors.

title: Rotating Gradient Card
description: A card with a gradient border that rotates on hover.
author: Harsh Gupta (adapted)
explanation: This pure CSS card uses a clever trick with `background` and `border-box` to create a gradient border. On hover, a simple `rotate` transform is applied.
html:
Article on29-June-2023

Different ways to use CSS in React

ReactCss
by Harsh Gupta

title: Like/Dislike Widget
description: An interactive like/dislike widget with firework animations on click.
author: Li-Deheng (adapted)
explanation: This component uses CSS for styling and animations, including a 'fireworks' effect on click. A small JavaScript snippet is used to handle the logic of ensuring that only 'like' or 'dislike' can be selected at one time.

title: Flipping Glow Card
description: A 3D card that flips on hover, with an animated glowing border on the back.
author: ElSombrero2 (adapted)
explanation: This pure CSS component uses 'transform-style: preserve-3d' on a container. The front and back faces are positioned absolutely. On hover, the container is rotated 180 degrees on the Y-axis to reveal the back. The glowing border on the back is a pseudo-element with a rotating gradient.

title: Expanding Share Buttons
description: A central share button that reveals multiple social media buttons in a circular pattern on hover.
author: csozidev (adapted)
explanation: This pure CSS component uses the :hover pseudo-class on a container to trigger transitions on its child button elements. Each button has a different `transition-delay` and `translate` value, creating a staggered, fanning-out animation.

title: Cyberpunk HUD Button
description: A futuristic button with animated HUD-style brackets and a scanline effect on hover.
author: Alex R.
explanation: This pure CSS effect uses pseudo-elements for the corner brackets and a scanline. On hover, CSS transitions and a single-run animation are triggered to move the brackets, sweep the scanline, and intensify the glow.

title: Liquid Metal Switch
description: A toggle switch where the handle appears to melt and reform into its new position.
author: Maya L.
explanation: A styled checkbox that uses a CSS transform for the sliding animation. An SVG filter is applied to the container to create a soft visual effect on the moving elements.

title: Inverted Gooey Blob Loader
description: A variation of the gooey loader where the blobs rotate as they split apart.
author: Sam J.
explanation: This version uses the same SVG filter as the original, but inverts the rotation animation. The CSS @keyframes are timed to apply rotation only during the 'split' phase of the animation cycle.
